bug.author: lluunn
bug.description:
We already have e2e test running periodically for click-to-deploy, with and without Istio. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/prow_config.yaml#L4-L28>https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/prow_config.yaml#L4-L28</denchmark-link>
But they are failing.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.85. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apps/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lluunn>@lluunn</denchmark-link> any update? Is this blocked on getting click to deploy to reuse the kfctl logic which <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kunmingg>@kunmingg</denchmark-link> has PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3045>#3045</denchmark-link> for?
yes, waiting for that and then we can fix the test

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lluunn>@lluunn</denchmark-link> Is this still blocked? I think <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link> is working on getting the new click to deploy up and running. Once that happens does that unblock this issue?
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
